Tasks.Task Description: Gather detailed requirements for storage capacity, performance, and redundancy. Identify the applications and workloads that will use StorSimple.
Design the storage architecture, including the placement of StorSimple devices, integration with on-premises and cloud environments, and data tiering strategy.
Order the required StorSimple device from Microsoft or an authorized reseller. Ensure the device meets the specifications for the project.
Install and configure the StorSimple device in the designated location. Connect it to the network and ensure proper power and cooling requirements are met.
Set up StorSimple Manager in the Azure portal to manage the StorSimple device. Configure device settings, storage accounts, and policies.
Enable encryption for data at rest and in transit. Configure access controls and ensure compliance with organizational security policies.
Perform thorough testing of the storage setup, including data transfer rates, latency, and failover scenarios to ensure the system meets the required specifications.
Set up backup policies and disaster recovery plans for the StorSimple device. Ensure data is replicated to Azure for redundancy.
Set up monitoring and alerting using Azure Monitor and StorSimple Manager. Regularly review storage usage and optimize data tiering policies.
Document the storage architecture, configurations, and operational procedures. Provide training for the operations team on managing and troubleshooting the setup.
Ensure the storage setup meets all regulatory compliance requirements. Implement regular auditing procedures to verify compliance and security postures.
